adjectives.description: wearish (comparative more wearish, superlative most wearish)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Tasteless, having a sickly flavour; insipid.

examples: Democritus, as he is described by Hippocrates and Laertius, was a little wearish old man, very melancholy by nature, averse from company in his latter days, and much given to solitariness […].
